name: Kakuna
description: Although it is a cocoon, it can move a little. It can extend its poison barb if it is attacked.

attacks.name: Speed Evolution
attacks.effect: Search your deck for a card that evolves from Kakuna and put it onto Kakuna. (This counts as evolving Kakuna.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.
